<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Cancel a recurring payment by PactualId"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/receiver/recurring/payment/pix/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Cancel a Recurring Payment, using its PactualId.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"pactualId","description":"BTG's unique ID for the payment to be canceled.","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Payload for Recurring Payment Cancel.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["identification","type"],"type":"object","properties":{"identification":{"description":"Official identification document number","type":"string"},"type":{"description":"Document Type: \r\n\r\nCPF (Registration of natural person).","enum":["CPF"],"type":"string","title":"ObkLoggedUserDocumentType"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"ObkLoggedUserDocument"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
